doc:
Jack Davis (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Davis_(actor) 0 John H. Davis (April 5, 1914 – November 3, 1992) was an American child actor, notable for appearing in Hal Roach's Our Gang series. His sister Mildred Davis also acted; she appeared in Roach comedian Harold Lloyd's films as his leading lady. When Lloyd and Mildred were married in 1923, Lloyd pulled Jack out of Our Gang and enrolled him in military school. John_H._Davis ( April_5_,_1914 – November_3_,_1992 ) was an_American_child_actor , notable for appearing in Hal_Roach 's_Our_Gang_series . His_sister_Mildred_Davis also acted ; she appeared in Roach_comedian_Harold_Lloyd 's_films as his_leading_lady . When Lloyd_and_Mildred were_married in 1923 , Lloyd pulled Jack out of Our_Gang and enrolled him in military_school .
